programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by host and executive producer Dwayne Johnson. In these Western division battles we see Robbie Rodriguez go up against Wayne Skivington for the men while Lindsey Hamm takes on Jamara Garrett for the women. They will compete on obstacles such as Nuts & Bolts, Chain Linked, Lunar Impact and Kick Out. Winners will move on to face reigning Titan’s on Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. Cari Champion and Alex Mendez serve as commentators.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Experience Namibia’s wild 1,000km coast! Where arid deserts meet stubborn life, this film captures a grandiose, fragile spectacle of nature thriving against all odds. Witness the impossible beauty!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Step back in time! Explore Queensland’s ancient wetlands and primary rainforests. Home to survivors of prehistoric eras, it’s a vibrant journey to the very origins of tropical Australia.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Small country, massive impact! Costa Rica hosts 5% of all Earth's species. Trek from peaks to shores to see why protecting this rich, living sanctuary is an absolute necessity for our planet.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Volunteers explore the community’s role in conservation, with thrilling honey harvesting, a new addition to the team, and a dream come true as one feeds a black rhino.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold (Season 1b) (S1)

programme.title: Deadliest Catch (S20)
programme.desc: A below-deck brawl puts Sophia's captaincy to the test. A hydro leak threatens Wild Bill's entire King Crab season. Keith goes dark in 20-foot seas.

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold (S1)
programme.desc: As Alaska's brutal winter bites, Todd works the night shift hoping to hit his million-dollar goal. Will the final gold weigh be a big win - or another disaster?

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold (S2)
programme.desc: When the Black Pearl's trommel motor catches fire, Todd's crew attempts to modify the smaller wash plant Jack built decades ago to run more pay dirt.

programme.title: Ed Stafford's Rite Of Passage (S1)
programme.desc: In Mongolia, Ed must wrestle the giant heirs of Genghis Khan to become a man. He takes part in the annual rite of passage festival, Naadam.

programme.title: Into The Jungle With Ed Stafford (S1)
programme.desc: Ed follows in the footsteps of the ancient Mayans as they camp in the jungle overnight. As a reward, Ed has a surprise for each family at sunrise.

programme.desc: Thinking they hit the jackpot, Oregon homesteaders buy their dream property. But flooding rivers devastate their home, gardens, and livestock.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W

It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: On a friendship trip to Thailand with real friends, the "Dokbakz" gather to celebrate. Their joy is short-lived, as they decide to pick the one who will shoulder the cost of the accommodation.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Seven cooks design their own pressure test inspired by seven different Connoisseur ice cream flavours. The cooks of the best two dishes will win immunity.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a popular Tuscan dish of red wine-infused beef stew served with creamy polenta.

programme.desc: In an ideal neighborhood, a ramshackle bungalow with some vandalism and a faulty foundation falls in Derek and Chauncey's laps. A friend of theirs needs help with a flip and only has two weeks.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Laura and Brandon have always wanted to live by the ocean and give their children the nautical life. After a major bathroom flood forces them to move, they decide it's time to make the leap.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Host Michael Yo introduces viewers to dining destinations deemed impossible - but also delicious! First up, a trip to Thailand to sip tea in a tree before jetting off to a restaurant balanced on a rock.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Gather around the table and prepare to give thanks! Rachael shows how to make a tender and crispy smoked turkey, seasoned with herbs and spices and served with chestnut and sausage stuffing.

programme.title: Enlighten Your Life (S3)
programme.desc: Today's theme is "Hotel Stay vs. Countryside Stay: The Accommodation Showdown!" For those who are passionate about interior design, places encountered during travels can provide a wealth of inspiration.

programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: The New Adventures of Wonder Woman E04 - The Bermuda Triangle Crisis
programme.desc: With the strength of Hercules, the wisdom of Athena, the speed of Mercury and the beauty of Aphrodite, she's Wonder Woman.

programme.desc: Reunited with old friends, Poirot takes on challenging new investigations, once again testing his ‘little grey cells'.

programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout the world, there are ancient structures that defy explanation. How were ancient civilisations able to build such extraordinary structures? And what purpose did they serve?

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S5)
programme.desc: Most people know it as the biblical birthplace of man. But is the Garden of Eden really just a story to explain creation? Or could it be a real place? And if it did exist—where exactly was it?

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Have you heard about the warrior bear who helped the Allies win WWII? Or how about the real-life hobbit humans in ancient Indonesia? What if I told you gerbils were recruited to fight crime in jails?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The American frontier is rich with legends of Native Americans and outlaws, but also eerie tales of cursed mountains, monsters, and UFOs. Could these tales be true? Is the Wild West stranger than we think?

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: For Mike and Jersey Jon, the deals are flying in a North Carolina garage. Meanwhile, Danielle and Robbie uncover the celebrated history of a legendary Kentucky hotel.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In 1983, underdog company Tonka sets out to bring a game-changing toy from Japan to America: the transformable robot. But they're soon confronted by industry giant, Hasbro, who has its own competing line.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: In the late 1800s Americans rarely bathed, lived in filthy conditions and deadly diseases were commonplace. But James Gamble and Harley Procter invent a revolutionary new soap that revolutionises America.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: Before chicken wings were America's favourite Sunday football snack, they were considered an undesirable cut of meat until two restaurateurs in Buffalo, New York, reinvented the way wings are cooked.

programme.title: The Art Of Washoku
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Japan's culinary heritage with this program celebrating the beauty of washoku—Japanese cuisine. Explore the kaiseki ryori, a multi-course meal inspired by the changing seasons.

programme.title: Carding Estrabel: Tirador Ng Malabon
programme.desc: One of the heroes that emerged during the Japanese occupation was the soldier-killer Carding (Dante Varona). After the war, Carding became a policeman and as such, continued his work of ridding the force of its corrupt elements.

programme.title: Chick Boy
programme.desc: Stars in this comedy about university students living in the fast lane though they cannot afford to. They find work as helpers to a rich woman with three beautiful nieces. Of course they turn on the charm for the girls and their aunt.

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Jabidah Massacre
programme.desc: Based on the expose made by the late Senator Benigno "Ninoy" Aquino, Jabidah Massacre chronicles the story of how a group of recruits are turned into soldiers for a secret mission - the invasion of Sabah.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos Sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: She-Man, Mistress Of The Universe
programme.desc: Joey de Leon played the role of Pando, a kind-hearted country bumpkin with illusions of being a superhero. His fantasy came true when he was given powers by Gayskull to enable him to rescue the barrio kids who had been kidnapped by the men of Skeleton.

programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 2
programme.desc: Scott shoots the moon on a bin that may cost him an arm and a leg. Then, T-Money spies a prize that could send him straight to the top. Plus, Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war that could send one of them to the retirement home.And later, the claws come out when the tension between Lori and Chrissy boils over.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.desc: It's a dance party on the move! JJ sings "Wheels on the Bus," pretends to be a train & a brave firefighter!

programme.title: JJ's Big Animal Adventure!
programme.desc: JJ's on a big animal adventure! He sings with the farm animals, meets a shark family & roars with dinosaurs!

programme.title: Big Surprises on the Farm!
programme.desc: There are big surprises on the farm! Ella & Bee find a mysterious tortoise egg & meet new tiger twin friends!

programme.title: Healthy Habits & Happy You!
programme.desc: Learn healthy habits on the farm! Ella learns to wash her hands, eat veggies & how to recycle!

programme.title: A Big Day of Rescues & Learning!
programme.desc: It's a big day of rescues! The crew puts out a barn fire, saves a friend from an avalanche & fixes a clock!

programme.title: The Biggest, Craziest Disasters!
programme.desc: The crew faces the biggest disasters! They escape an avalanche & rescue a friend trapped down a hole!

programme.title: Animals, Numbers, ABCs & More Fun!
programme.desc: Learn with KiiYii! They sing about animal sounds, count the five little ducks & learn about road safety!

programme.title: Let's Sing Our Favorite Classic Songs!
programme.desc: Let's sing classic songs with KiiYii! They sing "Bingo" on the farm & "Two Little Dicky Birds"!

programme.title: Underwater Learning Adventures!
programme.desc: It's an underwater learning adventure! The Sharksons sing the ABCs, learn colors & brush their shark teeth!

programme.title: A Big Ocean Clean Up Day!
programme.desc: It's an ocean clean-up day! Super Shark recycles rubbish & the family builds a ball pit from recycled items!

programme.title: Fun Adventures & Sleepy Songs!
programme.desc: It's a day of fun adventures & sleepy songs! Twinkle learns animal sounds & sings a lullaby with Mr. Moon!

programme.title: Kittens, Tutus & Fun Tea Parties!
programme.desc: It's CeCe Time! She gets a new kitten, dances in her ballerina tutu & hosts a fun tea party for her friends!

programme.title: How Does JJ Like to Play?
programme.desc: How does JJ like to play? He pretends to be a doctor, plays "Simon Says" & camps with his siblings!

programme.title: JJ Learns to Share, Help & Be Kind!
programme.desc: JJ learns to be kind! He uses the magic words, learns to share his toys & helps his family around the house!

programme.title: Drawing, Painting, Music & A Quick Fix!
programme.desc: It's a creative day for the Minibods! Newt learns to slow down her drawing & Lulu tries to make a music video!

programme.title: Fruits, Cupcakes, Snacks & Ice Cream!
programme.desc: The Minibods are hungry! Pogo waits for a fruit to ripen & Lulu's cupcake mix turns into a giant blob!

programme.title: The Whole Crew to the Rescue!
programme.desc: The whole crew is to the rescue! They save a stranded Blue, help Kat in an out-of-control car & make a beach!

programme.title: Funny Feelings & Creative Fixes!
programme.desc: Gecko has creative fixes for funny feelings! He cheers up a sad Fiona & paints a bus to help an anxious Mech!

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Healthy Habits & Happy You!
programme.desc: Learn healthy habits on the farm! Ella learns to wash her hands, eat veggies & how to recycle!

programme.title: Let's Sing Our Favorite Songs!
programme.desc: Let's sing with JJ & his animal friends! They perform "Old Macdonald" & a play version of "Hey Diddle Diddle"!

programme.title: At Home with Cody and His Family!
programme.desc: It's a day at home with Cody's family! He helps his dad at the bakery & learns about African instruments!

programme.title: A Fun School Day with JJ & Friends!
programme.desc: It's a fun school day with JJ! He learns the alphabet with blocks & sings about the five senses!

programme.title: Baby John Meets Our Local Heroes!
programme.desc: Baby John meets our local heroes! He learns about police officers, firefighters & becomes an ambulance driver!

programme.title: The Ultimate Creative Challenge!
programme.desc: Baby John takes a creative challenge! He builds a snowman out of mud & creates his own yummy muffins!

programme.title: Awesome Animal Facts!
programme.desc: Blippi learns awesome animal facts! He finds out how many teeth a shark has & what a T-Rex is like as a pet!

programme.title: A Guide To Fun & Healthy Days!
programme.desc: Blippi learns how to have a healthy day! He learns about sunscreen, pizza-making & the benefits of sleep!

programme.title: Mom's Crazy Inventions Go Haywire!
programme.desc: Mom's inventions are going haywire! The smart house has a tantrum & a time machine creates a pterodactyl!

programme.desc: Arpo faces squirrel trouble & other wacky problems, like a ghost in the house & a malfunctioning music mode!

programme.title: JJ's Favorite Classic Sing-Alongs!

programme.desc: Spend a day with Nina's family! She learns about planes from her Dad & makes breakfast with her Abuelita!

programme.desc: It's a big day of fun & learning! Mia & Max go on a train ride, learn shapes & sing on the big red bus!

programme.title: Learning to Do the Right Thing!

programme.desc: How do you cover a year’s bills when most of your income comes in one month? One man’s path out of 70k debt. Plus, would you give up a stable paycheque to chase freedom?

programme.title: CNA Correspondent
programme.desc: China’s rare earth reign has the world scrambling to catch up countries are building supply chains, forging alliances and recycling materials to break its grip. But real change could take decades.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: In 1991 Curtis "Cochise" Smith, 29, heads out for diapers in Plaquemine, Louisiana, and vanishes. Twenty-five years later, a body surfaces in the bayou, and Cochise's murder case reignites.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After meeting at a salsa club, Lulu and Ramon Sosa find they make a good team and marry. But after having financial difficulties, the relationship breaks down.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: July 1, 2021, Falls Township, Pennsylvania. Falls Township Police are dispatched to the New Falls Motel after receiving a call about an unresponsive female.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: With the help of digital forensics, authorities are able to debunk the alibi of one of the last people to see a 24-year-old missing jogger in rural Arkansas, making him the primary suspect in her murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When a university student and athlete is stabbed to death following a minor traffic incident, a 24-year-old fast food worker is indicted on a second-degree murder charge.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: Sean Foley stands accused in the shooting death of his girlfriend's step-father. After a booze-filled evening, Sean fatally shoots Jimmy on Jimmy's own back porch.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a routine undercover prostitution sting, Columbus Vice Detective Andrew Mitchell shoots and kills 23-year-old Donna Dalton Castleberry.

programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Maliwanagan kung ano ang suprasegmental, pagbubuod, pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, at kung paano gamitin ang angkop na pahayag at panadang anaporik at kataporik na pangngalan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of geometry of shapes and sizes, and geometric relationships.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: Learn how to use multimedia resources and oral language when giving information, and how to express one's belief, cite evidence, and reign in thoughts in public forums.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy sa Timog at Kanlurang Asya sa transisyonal at makabagong panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: Know more about motion in one dimension, waves as a carrier of energy, and the characteristics of light, alongside the different charging processes and how heat is transferred.

programme.title: Als
programme.desc: Learn about the process of planning, setting up, running a small business, and entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin ang wastong pagamit ng mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Aralin kung paano magsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita, at kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: Discover what are percents, polygons, circles, solid figures, sequences, time, circumference, and how to solve simple equations.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: Differentiate the various text-types and know how to summarize them, as well as how to make a stand and provide evidences supporting opinions or facts.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa mga pagbabago sa lipunan ng sinaunang Pilipino kabilang ang pagpupunyagi ng ilang pangkat na mapanatili ang kalayaan sa Kolonyalismong Espanyol at ang impluwensya nito sa kasalukuyan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about motion in terms of distance and time, alongside how objects and people interact and are affected by light, sound, and heat, and electricity. Discover the relationship of electricity and magnetism in electromagnets, and what simple DC circuits are.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: L'Avenir Nous Appartient
programme.desc: Senior citizens rediscover the pleasure of getting out and about by bike; Marc Hervieux learns all about carbon-neutral coffee; a helpline to reduce the obsessive thoughts of those hooked on pornography; when teenagers talk to teenagers about sexual cyberviolence.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: In the 1990s, a man raped and murdered women in car parks or apartments, mainly in eastern Paris. Martine Monteil, head of the Paris Criminal Brigade, and investigating judge Gilbert Thiel hunted him for years. In March 1998, Guy Georges was finally arrested...

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Away for quite some time, Ulysses joins the therapy via video call. Penelope longs for him and tries to make him understand that long-distance love isn't easy.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: De Miel Et De Sang
programme.desc: Carel has returned to his native Provence. With his former high school friend, today head of the local police, he investigates the death of a man killed by being stung by dozens of bees. Gradually they uncover a horrific case from the past, one that had shaken the entire village.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Or De Vie
programme.desc: In Burkina Faso, at the Bantara gold mining site and risking his life, 16-year-old Rasmane descends to a depth of over 100 metres to extract gold. Worried about accidents and torn by his parents' doubts, he is driven by the hope of a better life.

programme.title: Rentrons
programme.desc: In a village in northern Algeria, Nouria and Abdel, a Frenchman who lives and works there, are friends. Following a bet, they set off on a moped trip along the Mediterranean coast. Their goal: to board a boat that will take them back to France.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Pascale realises that Myriam is wearing a chain that belongs to her and accuses the children of stealing it. After admitting that she took it, Lea now needs to find a way to make amends, with a little help from Loïc.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Grandma and Grandpa are worried about their daughter and put together a plan with Loïc and Fred in order to help her... or not! Andy is enthusiastic about getting to know them, but Grandpa is a touch more hesitant.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Nick comes across Sophia in the company of her latest crush, who seems to have come straight out of the pages of a glossy magazine. His confidence thoroughly shaken, Nick lets his brother Loïc give him a make-over.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: After her trip to Rawdon for a little wellness therapy under a spiritual guide Myriam is now attending evening classes. Nick, Loïc, Lea and Fred are surprised to learn that she is ready to have them back.

programme.title: Maghreb-Orient Express
programme.desc: What's new in the Arab worlds? Journalist Mohamed Kaci hosts those making the cultural headlines in Tunis, Algiers, Rabat, Beirut, Alexandria, Dubai...

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: An immersive trip aboard the Breton trawler ''Le Magellan''. Ten days to the rhythm of a net that needs to be raised every 4 hours, followed by sorting, gutting and storing the fish in the hold. Ten days alongside this chain gang of the seas and their worries.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: The Paulin brothers grew up in Le Reposoir, a small village nestled in the heart of the Aravis, and each chose his own way to live the mountain to the extreme. One walks barefoot on a slackline stretched between two dizzying points, the other climbs the most demanding faces of the Mont-Blanc massif.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: We visit an old railway station that has been converted into a home, then meet the famous magician Peter Marvey, who shows us around his house.

programme.title: Curieux Begin
programme.desc: Stopover in Italy! From Chianti to Subbiano, from large vineyards to small farms, Christian visits Tuscany and discovers its land, artisans, and culinary treasures.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: From fashion to painting, the designer Marcel Marongiu presents his pictures at the Poliakoff Gallery. Encounter. All about the French expression ''se mettre sur son 31'' (dressing to the nines). Wakaze creates sake made in France. Red alert: but how best to wear it?

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Curieux Begin
programme.desc: Stopover in Italy! From Chianti to Subbiano, from large vineyards to small farms, Christian visits Tuscany and discovers its land, artisans, and culinary treasures.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: We visit an old railway station that has been converted into a home, then meet the famous magician Peter Marvey, who shows us around his house.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: The Paulin brothers grew up in Le Reposoir, a small village nestled in the heart of the Aravis, and each chose his own way to live the mountain to the extreme. One walks barefoot on a slackline stretched between two dizzying points, the other climbs the most demanding faces of the Mont-Blanc massif.

programme.title: Bestioles & Cie
programme.desc: Whether it's a lake, tree or field, there are always a host of mini-creatures. Often feared, because unknown, we discover just how fascinating they are as we take an immersive visit into their world. Often, and wrongly, underestimated, they play an essential role in the natural cycle of life.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.
